title: New Rule!
description: In New Rule! the children decide to play hide-and-seek. As they play, they decide that they need some rules in order to make the game fun. What rules will they make? Readers will have the opportunity to ask and answer questions as well as to make inferences. Colorful, supportive illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support emergent readers.
meta: hide-and-seek, others, ready, rule, seek, starving
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Make Inferences/Draw Conclusions : Make inferences/Draw conclusions
Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant /st/ blend
Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant st blend
